impacts_stories.story_title: Resolution of The President of the Republic of Uzbekistan “On additional measures to ensure openness and transparency of public administration, as well as to improve the statistical capacity of the country” dated April 9, 2019 №PP-4273.
Open data portal of the Republic of Uzbekistan data.gov.uz has achieved the silver level according to the Open Data Institute (ODI)

results.tenders_awards: Open data certificate (silver level) of ODI
results.commitment_oil_mining_description: Production of certain types of oil products
results.disclosure_oil_mining_description: Mining of oil and gas condensate ( thousand t.)
